item.title: Teem, "Tiamat's" Signmaker
item.description: Teem2’7” ; 31lbs ; NG Str→11Dex→18Con→16Int→10Wis→14Cha→16 PersuasionDeceptionInvestigationSurvival CommonDraconicGoblin Painters Supplies PrestidigitationFrostbiteFaerie FireSleep Teem started life in a cold war, his tribe driven far beneath the earth. When his tribe was gifted a reincarnation of Tiamat - Dogmak, the languid - they lashed out with religious vigor to protect her. Near the surface again, Teem built signs no longer tricking Goblin scouts, but instead helping pilgrims traveling to Dogmaks birth-site.
